remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix GetCurrentValueCore(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix defaultOriginValue, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.span: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由 确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一个在组合链中，此值将是快照值 （如果可用） 或基属性值; 否则此值将使用链中前一个动画返回的值不 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基本的值，如果动画位于第一个动画组合层中的属性; 否则值为从上一个动画组合层中的属性输出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAdditive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAdditive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应将目标属性的当前值添加到此动画的起始值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value.

value.span: 如果应将目标属性的当前值与此动画的起始值相加，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖项属性比较特殊，因为它的标识符字段来自和共享的各种派生的类。This dependency property is unusual because the identifier field for it comes from and is shared by various derived classes. ## Examples 下面的示例使用两个相似动画进行动画处理同一个矩形。The following example uses two similar animations to animate the same rectangle. 第一个动画属性设置为`false`，因此它始终矩形进行动画处理从 (0，0)，该动画的起始值。The first animation's property is set to `false`, so it always animates the rectangle from (0,0), the animation's starting value. 第二个动画具有相同的目标值 (其设置是相同)，但其属性设置为`true`; 因此，它是当应用动画位于任何位置从矩形进行动画处理。The second animation has the same target values (their settings are identical), but its property is set to `true`; as a result, it animates the rectangle from whatever position it is at when the animation is applied. [!code-xaml[PathAnimationGallery_snippet#MatrixAnimationUsingPathIsAdditiveExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PathAnimationGallery_snippet/CS/matrixanimationusingpathisadditiveexample.xaml#matrixanimationusingpathisadditiveexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAngleCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAngleCumulative : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定动画矩阵的旋转角度是否应随着重复累计。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the rotation angle of the animated matrix should accumulate over repetitions.

value.span: 如果动画的旋转角度应在动画重复时累计，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the animation's rotation angle should accumulate over repetitions; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，在动画重复时，将累积动画矩阵的旋转角度。If this property is set to `true`, the rotation angle of the animated matrix will accumulate as the animation repeats. 如果你的路径是小弧线，累积角度将导致您的对象连续旋转，而不是重新开始旋转每次重复使用。If your path is a small arc, a cumulative angle will cause your object to continuously rotate with each repeat instead of restarting the rotation. 再加上的`true`，您的对象可能看起来变动而弹回 （具体取决于您指定的路径）。When combined with an of `true`, your object might appear to tumble while it bounces (depending on the path you specify). 有关相关信息，请参阅。For related information, see . 如果设置此属性没有任何作用是`false`。Setting this property has no effect if is `false`. 此属性确定由于在动画重复时是否累计动画矩阵的角度其设置; 它不会导致的偏移量累积时重新启动动画。This property determines whether the animation matrix's angle accumulates when the animation repeats because of its setting; it does not cause the offset to accumulate when the animation is restarted. 有关如何使动画关闭前一个动画的值生成的信息，请参阅。For information on how to make an animation build off a previous animation's values, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例使用两个相似动画进行动画处理同一个矩形。The following example uses two similar animations to animate the same rectangle. 这两个动画具有相同设置，这会导致要旋转它沿屏幕移到右侧，以及这两个动画都设置为重复四次的矩形。Both animations have the same setting, which causes the rectangle to rotate as it moves along the screen to the right, and both animations are set to repeat four times. 第一个动画属性设置为`false`，因此矩形跳回其原始的角度，在动画重复时。The first animation's property is set to `false`, so the rectangle jumps back to its original angle when the animation repeats. 第二个动画属性设置为`true`; 因此，矩形角度显示，提高在动画重复，而不是一个在跳转回其原始值。The second animation's property is set to `true`; as a result, the rectangle angle appears to increase when the animation repeats, rather than jumping back to its original value. [!code-xaml[PathAnimationGallery_snippet#MatrixAnimationUsingPathIsAngleCumulativeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PathAnimationGallery_snippet/CS/matrixanimationusingpathisanglecumulativeexample.xaml#matrixanimationusingpathisanglecumulativeexamplewholepage)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsAngleCumulativeProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOffsetCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOffsetCumulative : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示动画矩阵产生的偏移量是否会因重复而累积。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the offset produced by the animated matrix will accumulate over repetitions.

value.span: 如果对象将在动画重复时累计，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the object will accumulate over repeats of the animation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，在动画重复时，将累积动画矩阵的偏移量。If this property is set to `true`, the offset of the animated matrix will accumulate as the animation repeats. 例如，如果路径是小弧线和动画设置为重复，累积偏移量将导致在屏幕上弹跳效果的对象。For example, if the path is a small arc and the animation is set to repeat, a cumulative offset will cause the object to appear to bounce across the screen. 此属性确定动画矩阵的偏移量累积由于在动画重复时其设置; 它不会导致的偏移量累积时重新启动动画。This property determines whether the animation matrix's offset accumulates when the animation repeats because of its setting; it does not cause the offset to accumulate when the animation is restarted. 有关如何使动画关闭前一个动画的值生成的信息，请参阅。For information on how to make an animation build off a previous animation's values, see . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty IsOffsetCumulativeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly IsOffsetCumulativeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 获取或设置用于生成此动画输出值的几何图形。

span.span: Gets or sets the geometry used to generate this animation's output values.

value.span: 用于生成此动画输出值的几何图形。

span.span: The geometry used to generate this animation's output values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个可以描述复杂的形状包含曲线和弧线，让你指定为动画输入复杂的形状。A can describe complex shapes that contain curves and arcs, enabling you specify complex shapes for your animation input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Geometry 概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/geometry-overview.md)。For more information, see [Geometry Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/geometry-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
